title: Don't get some text messages in a group chat
content:
I have a Pixel 3 XL. I have Visible as my provider (they are Verizon's prepaid arm) I use the Messages app for text messages.

I have been seeing a weird problem with group texts. I randomly don't get some of the text messages. I will get a text from Person B responding to a text from Person A but will never get the original message from Person A. Leads to very awkward situations where people think Im being rude by not responding.

I am not sure what the problem is. But the pattern that I have noticed that the missing messages are usually from people with iPhones

Anyone else run into something like this?
